reviewText: This item was bought as a gift for a friend daugher.  Last i heard their daughter is hooked on it.

The little opening and closing songs are really cute. And what's not to love here? My kids enjoy watching the video, it's not vulgar, doesn't annoy me while I have to hear it, and this DVD allows me nearly an hour to paint my toenails, uninterrupted. Gotta love that Madeline.
